verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3967>them,<s%> "I am one hundred <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> this <S%H3117>day;<s%> I <S%H3201>can<s%> no more go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>me,<s%> 'You shall not go over this <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>'

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he will go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8045>you;<s%> he will destroy these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and you shall dispossess <S%H3091>them.<s%> Joshua shall go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> as Yahweh has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> to them as he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and to their <S%H776>land;<s%> whom he <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will deliver them <S%H5414>up<s%> before <S%H6440>you,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them according to all the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid, nor be <S%H6206>scared<s%> of <S%H6440>them:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he it is who does <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H7503>you;<s%> he will not fail <S%H5800>you,<s%> nor forsake you."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous:<s%> for you shall <S%H935>go<s%> with this <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5157>them;<s%> and you shall cause them to inherit it.

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he it is who does <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7503>you;<s%> he will be with you, he will not fail <S%H5800>you,<s%> neither forsake <S%H3372>you:<s%> don't be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> this <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in the <S%H4150>set<s%> time of the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>release,<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents,<s%>

when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> you shall <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%> before all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing.<s%>

<S%H6950>Assemble<s%> <S%H6950>the<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and your <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that they may <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and that they may <S%H3925>learn,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law;<s%>

and that their <S%H1121>children,<s%> who have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> may <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as long <S%H3117>as<s%> you <S%H2416>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> where you go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3117>"Behold,<s%> your days <S%H7126>approach<s%> that you must <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3320>present<s%> yourselves in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> that I may <S%H6680>commission<s%> <S%H4872>him.<s%>" Moses and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> over the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7901>"Behold,<s%> you shall sleep with your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and this <S%H5971>people<s%> will rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> and play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> where they <S%H935>go<s%> to be <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5800>them,<s%> and will forsake <S%H6565>me,<s%> and break my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I have made with <S%H3772>them.<s%>

Then my <S%H639>anger<s%> shall be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and I will <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H5641>them,<s%> and I will hide my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H398>them,<s%> and they shall be devoured, and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> shall come <S%H4672>on<s%> <S%H559>them;<s%> so that they will say in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H7451><s%> 'Haven't these evils <S%H4672>come<s%> on us because our <S%H430>God<s%> is not among <S%H7130>us?<s%>'

I will <S%H5641>surely<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> for all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which they shall have <S%H6213>worked,<s%> in <S%H3588>that<s%> they are <S%H6437>turned<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

"Now therefore <S%H3789>write<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> for <S%H3925>yourselves,<s%> and teach it to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> that this <S%H7892>song<s%> may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> for me against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For when I shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and they shall have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H1878>themselves,<s%> and grown fat; then will they <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5006>them,<s%> and despise <S%H6565>me,<s%> and break my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

It shall <S%H7227>happen,<s%> when many <S%H7451>evils<s%> and <S%H6869>troubles<s%> have come <S%H4672>on<s%> <S%H7892>them,<s%> that this song shall <S%H6030>testify<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them as a <S%H5707>witness;<s%> for it shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouths<s%> of their <S%H2233>seed:<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H3336>imagination<s%> which they <S%H6213>frame<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> before I have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3925>taught<s%> it the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H6680>commissioned<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous;<s%> for you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I swore to <S%H7650>them:<s%> and I will be with you."

It <S%H4872>happened,<s%> when Moses had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3789>writing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> until they were <S%H8552>finished,<s%>
that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it by the <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that it may be there for a witness against <S%H5707>you.<s%>

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4805>rebellion,<s%> and your <S%H7186>stiff<s%> <S%H6203>neck:<s%> <S%H2416>behold,<s%> while I am yet alive with you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> you have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and how much more <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death?<s%>

<S%H6950>Assemble<s%> to me all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to witness against <S%H5749>them.<s%>

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%> you will <S%H7843>utterly<s%> <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5493>yourselves,<s%> and turn aside from the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7451>you;<s%> and evil will <S%H7122>happen<s%> to you in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> because you will <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> through the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song,<s%> until they were <S%H8552>finished.<s%>
